review.name: Emilia C.
review.text: “A hardcoded review from a very satisfied customer of VISCOMPLAST's services.”

sponsorSection.title: Our Partners
sponsorSection.description: We offer a complete range of services for the production and installation of <PVC>PVC</PVC> and <ALUMINIU>aluminum</ALUMINIU> structures using profile systems <RAMPLAST>RAMPLAST</RAMPLAST>, <GEALAN>GEALAN</GEALAN>, <VEKA>VEKA</VEKA>, and <KURTOGLU>KURTOGLU</KURTOGLU>. In manufacturing structures, we use only high-quality hardware from <WINKHAUS>WINKHAUS</WINKHAUS> and <GU>G-U</GU>.

offerSteps.title: Consultation and Design
offerSteps.description: Our sales managers will help you choose the profile, glass, color, and hardware for your project. You will then receive a price offer with all the discussed details.

offerSteps.title: Measurement
offerSteps.description: Once the order is confirmed, the engineer will visit you to perform the final measurements.

offerSteps.title: Production
offerSteps.description: Depending on the complexity of the project, the execution time varies between 5 and 15 working days.

offerSteps.title: Installation
offerSteps.description: A team of professional installers will come to safely install your joinery.

aboutDescription: We are a company built on the values of a family business with the intention to produce PVC and Aluminum joinery at the highest level.

We work together to offer quality services, a good product, and to build long-term relationships. We believe we are stronger due to the complementary skills of our family members and the values we rely on: fairness, excellence, ambition, efficiency, and personal fulfillment.

The strategy we have approached from the beginning is one of natural and organic growth, absolutely customer-oriented. There is no problem that cannot be solved in relation to the customer's requirements.

profiles.title: WHS Profile by VEKA
profiles.description: The WHS system by VEKA optimally combines practicality and accessibility. It is designed for manufacturing windows in standard configurations for consumers.
characteristics: Sealing in two rows of gaskets

profiles.title: KBE Profile by VEKA
profiles.description: The KBE system by VEKA offers excellent performance and energy efficiency. It is ideal for modern residential projects.

profiles.title: Salamander Profile
profiles.description: The Salamander system offers an elegant design and high durability. Perfect for modern homes and commercial buildings.

hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: The WHS system by VEKA optimally combines practicality and accessibility. It is designed for manufacturing windows in standard configurations for consumers. Using 6-chamber profile systems and energy-efficient double-glazed windows allows you to provide the necessary level of comfort in your home. WHS systems by VEKA allow the installation of double-glazed windows with enhanced noise protection.

profiles.title: ALDOX Profile
profiles.description: The ALDOX profile is the optimal solution for sliding doors and windows. Its construction allows for an excellent combination of durability and elegance.

profiles.title: KURTOGLU 60T Profile
profiles.description: The KURTOGLU 60T profile is ideal for residential and commercial projects, offering excellent performance and an attractive appearance.

profiles.title: Kurtoglu 74T Profile
profiles.description: The Kurtoglu 74T profile is a premium aluminum system that ensures thermal comfort and superior aesthetics.

hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: Aluminum systems are known for their high reliability, durability, and modern aesthetics. We use premium-quality hardware to guarantee functionality and safety.
